Name: Wild Times
About the game: The bounty hunter sets off on a dangerous adventure, where evil creatures from another world, right up to a revived cactus, await him, shoot back, get new weapons, unique bonuses and dodge enemy bullets, boulders, traps and meet at the end face to face with an ancient evil. Wild Times - Top Down Shooter, where the player dodging all kinds of dangers, fires back and performs various tasks, finding and improving his weapons throughout the game, getting bonuses and moving from one world to another. Control: Arrows - Move Z - Shooting Left X - Shooting Straight C - Shooting Right Features of the game: - Retro - Beautiful Pixel-Art - Weapon Improvements - Bonuses
